import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { onSubmit(formValue: any) { let email = formValue?.email; let password = formValue?.password; } }
